mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT f.FAVORITEID as favoriteId, f.USERNUMBER as userNumber, f.CREATEDAT as createdAt, i.APARTMENTID as apartmentId, i.APTNM as aptNm, i.ESTATEAGENTSGGNM as estateAgentSggNm, i.EXCLUUSEAR as excluUseAr, i.FLOOR as floor, i.BUILDYEAR as buildYear, i.DEALAMOUNT as dealAmount, i.ROADNM as roadNm, i.JIBUN as jibun, i.UMDNM as umdNm, i.SUBWAYSTATION as subwayStation, i.SUBWAYDISTANCE as subwayDistance, i.LAT as lat, i.LNG as lng FROM APARTMENT_FAVORITE f LEFT JOIN APARTMENTINFO i ON f.APARTMENTID = i.APARTMENTID WHERE f.USERNUMBER = #{userNumber} ORDER BY f.CREATEDAT DESC
